description:
More than 1,000 people picketed ABC’s headquarters in Burbank on Saturday to protest a Jimmy Kimmel segment that joked that the United States should “kill everyone in China.”超过1000名抗议者在上周六围堵了位于伯班克的美国广播公司总部，对《吉米鸡毛秀》上称美国应该“杀光所有中国人”的言论进行抗议。

Burbank police said they responded to the protest after some demonstrators went into a restricted area. However, police said the protest was peaceful and no one was arrested.一些抗议者后进入了限制区，伯班克警方对抗议活动采取了措施。但是警方称这场抗议是以和平方式进行的，没有人被捕。

The protest was part of a nationwide move backed by Chinese American organizations against the “Jimmy Kimmel Live” recurring segment called “Kids' Table.” Similar protests were planned for Saturday at other ABC locations.这次抗议是美国全国范围内发起的针对“吉米鸡毛秀”上“儿童圆桌会议”片段的大规模抗议活动的一部分，这些抗议活动获得了美国华人组织的支持。上周六当天，抗议者还计划在美国广播公司各分部发起抗议。

In the Oct. 16 segment, Kimmel has a roundtable discussion with a group of children about the United States’ $1.3-trillion debt to China.在10月16日播出的吉米鸡毛秀上，吉米主持了一场由几名儿童参加的圆桌会议，谈论美国欠中国的1.3万亿债务问题。

He asks them how the United States should repay its debt, which prompted one child to respond by saying “kill everyone in China.” Kimmel later engaged the children again with a debate about killing the Chinese people or allowing them to live.他问几名儿童美国应该如何偿还这笔债务，一名儿童回答说要“杀光中国人”。然后吉米又引导孩子们展开了一场应该杀光中国人还是放过他们的辩论。

ABC and Kimmel have since apologized for the segment.此后美国广播公司和吉米就该节目片段进行了道歉。
